title: A NICE Retrospective on Shaping Cybersecurity’s Future | NIST
snippet: Rodney Petersen has served as the Director of NICE at the National Institute for Standards and Technology (NIST) for the past eleven years where his focus has been on advancing cybersecurity education and workforce development.
